_sText:
This is a hosties map.  Please do not post any assesment if you do not know how to play, and it makes it difficult for you.

I have added portals to all the last request areas.  Gun toss is nothing special, just a ramp.  S4s is 2 platforms suspended in the air with some fog around them.  Race is a bhop race.  s4s and bhop have a spec tele too.  These put you in a room above the action so you can watch out of the way.  There is also a small pit for Chicken Fight and Knife Fights.  Have fun
